person.persName: John Burton Thompson Jr. (Harrodsburg, Kentucky, Provis Govt page)

body.p: Harrodsburg, Mercer County, Kentucky, Provisional Government page. Kentucky native. Son of Philip B. Thompson and Martha Thompson. Resident of Mercer County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Harrodsburg, Kentucky in 1860. Elected sergeant at arms, door keeper, and page of the Provisional Government of Kentucky in November 1861.
